channel.title: admin on Peer Herholz
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Peer Herholz

item.description: Ahoi hoi there and welcome to my website. My name is Peer and I’m currently a postdoctoral researcher in cognitive and computational auditory neuroscience partly affiliated with the Montréal Neurological Institute & Hospital (MNI) located at McGill University & with the International Laboratory for Brain, Music and Sound Research (BRAMS) which is jointly run by the Université de Montréal & McGill University. More precisely, I work in the Zatorre & NeuroDataScience: ORIGAMI labs.
